unalcol.service

Class ServicePool

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.service.ServicePool

  • public class ServicePool
extends java.lang.Object
    ServicePool

    Set of services that have been associated to objects.

    Source code is available.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServicePool

        public ServicePool()

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public java.lang.Object get(java.lang.Class<?> owner,
                            java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Obtains the service instance that provides the requested type of service to the given class owner. If there is not a service instance associated to the given class owner, it will look in the super classes of the class owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - Class that owns the service
        type - Type of service requested
        Returns:
        A service instance that provides the requested type of service to the class owner if available, null otherwise.

      • get

        public java.lang.Object get(java.lang.Object owner,
                            java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Obtains the service instance that provides the requested type of service to the given object owner. If there is not a service instance associated to the given object owner, it will look if there is a service associated to the class (or super classes) of the object owner, and it will look in the super classes of the class owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - Object that owns the service
        type - Type of service requested
        Returns:
        A service instance that provides the requested type of service to the object owner if available, null otherwise.

      • getAll

        public java.lang.Object[] getAll(java.lang.Class<?> owner,
                                 java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Obtains the set of service instances providing the requested type of service for the given class owner. It looks for every registered instance that can be assignable (according to instances class type) to the requested type, and it will look in the super classes of class owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - Class that owns the service
        type - Type of service requested.
        Returns:
        Array with the found services.

      • getAll

        public java.lang.Object[] getAll(java.lang.Object owner,
                                 java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Obtains the set of service instances providing the requested type of service for the given object owner. It looks for every registered instance that can be assignable (according to instances class type) to the requested type, and it will look in the class and super classes of class owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - Class that owns the service
        type - Type of service requested.
        Returns:
        Array with the found services.

      • set

        public boolean set(java.lang.Object owner,
                   java.lang.Class<?> type,
                   java.lang.Object instance)
        Sets the service instance that will be associated to the service type to the object owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - Object that will own the service
        type - Type of service that will by provided
        instance - Service that will provide the service.
        Returns:
        If the service instance was associated to the service type for the object owner.

      • set

        public boolean set(java.lang.Object owner,
                   java.lang.Object instance)
        Sets the service instance to the object owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - Object that will own the service.
        instance - Service that will provide the service.
        Returns:
        If the service instance was associated to the object owner.

      • remove

        public boolean remove(java.lang.Object owner)
        Removes the object owner from the service pool (removes all services associated to the object owner)
        Parameters:
        owner - Object that will be removed from the service pool
        Returns:
        If the object owner was removed from the service pool.
